returnValues.name: get
returnValues.description: Retrieves the value of a specific cookie by its name.

returnValues.name: getAll
returnValues.description: Returns all available cookies as a key-value object.

returnValues.name: remove
returnValues.description: Deletes a cookie by setting its max-age to 0.

returnValues.name: set
returnValues.type: (name: string, value: string, options?: UseCookieOptions) => void
returnValues.description: Creates or updates a cookie with the specified value and attributes.
